Package academy.mindswap.Connect4

Class Server

java.lang.Object
academy.mindswap.Connect4.Server
public class Server extends Object
Class responsible for creating a server and accepting players to start the game.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      It's the main method of the class Server.
      Parameters:
      args - an array of Strings

    • start

      private void start()
      This method starts the server creating a new server socket that receives a PORT number and a pool thread. It calls the method acceptPlayer.

    • acceptPlayer

      private void acceptPlayer()
      Server socket accepts player's socket (blocking method). Initializes "PlayerHandler" that accepts the client socket as parameter. It calls the method drawLogo that prints for each player the logotype of the game. It sends a message to each player asking for their name. After a player connects to the server, it's added to the ArrayList. It calls the findPlayer method. In the end, it's a recursive call.

    • drawLogo

      private void drawLogo(PlayerHandler playerHandler)
      Draw a logo for each player in the beginning of the game with random colors.
      Parameters:
      playerHandler - a PlayerHandler object.

    • findPlayer

      public void findPlayer()
      It creates an array of playerHandlers. The game starts if the position 1 of the array created isn't null, meaning that the array is full of players and ready to start a new game.
